name: The Nature of Gravity
description:
A game made in two weeks for a school final.

Navigate through obstacles and deadly objects using your unique platforming ability: influencing the direction of gravity. Collect arrow keys, jump over spikes, move crates, and reach the flag at the end of the level by understanding the nature of gravity.


Controls:

  • Arrow keys to move
  • Z, C, or N to jump
  • X, V, or M to freeze mid-air and any arrow key to change the direction of gravity
  • P or Enter for pause menu
  • E to reset a level (or select option in pause menu)

Credits:
Made by 4RT1F1C1AL, Daniel C., Katrina C., and Tina Y.
Music by Felipe Jun I.
